workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.15553825425067686 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.18965853549494688 --weight-decay 0.0003534375485457435 --lr 9.65318899278457e-05 --lr-scheduler fixed --warmup-updates 154683 --min-lr 1e-09 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.04862857887930594 --max-update 3500000 --max-epoch 15 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
